name: Grand Bout
description:
Welcome, to the Grand Bout! One person will reign supreme as the one-and-only Wizard King! And what better way to determine such a person, than with Grand Bout! Gather your friends and fight for your right to supremacy!

Be careful, though. Magic in Grand Bout is fueled by Lifeforce and you can only keep so much lifeforce stored up. Exhausting this depot taxes your health instead.

Grand Bout is controller-exclusive and multiplayer only.
